text: Gallop Racer 2001, also known as Gallop Racer 5 in Japan, is an horse racing video game. This is the first debuted the Gallop Racer series for PlayStation 2. Category:2001 video games Category:Tecmo games Category:Arcade games Category:Horse racing video games Category:PlayStation 2 games Category:PlayStation 2-only games Category:Video game sequels Category:Video games developed in Japan
title: Gallop Racer 2001
